content: hi everyone, i have a question. what will happen to an ethereum chain if the majority of the validators will go offline indefinitely, will the chain stall or will it automatically recover?

author: potuz
content: The chain will not even stall for a while, it will lower throghput as there will be many missed blocks, but the chain will advance and eventually finalize again after kicking out the offline validators
